kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Select the Link of the Child Window
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Verify the user is switched to Child window
Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://*[@class='inner-box']/h1' contains exact text 'DOCUMENTS REQUEST'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${result} = Note : This template needs to be strictly followed to send response. We will validate if you are real enrolled user before sending the resources needed.
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Note : This template needs to be strictly followed to send response. We will validate if you are real enrolled user before sending the resources needed.
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Grab the email id from the Child Window
Get Text
kw.msg: ${text1} = Please email us at mentor@rahulshettyacademy.com with below template to receive response
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Split String
kw.msg: @{newText} = [ Please email us | mentor@rahulshettyacademy.com with below templ | e to receive response ]
kw.doc: Splits the ``string`` using ``separator`` as a delimiter string.

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.
